name: Emoji Charades (itch)
description:
Emoji Charades is a saucy party game to play with other ear-hole and eyeball owners.

Use a phone to create emoji clues. The whole room tries to decipher those clues as fast as they can! Enjoy over 25 different trivia categories, from basic stuff like food and geography to strange things like "Things Humans Do Sometimes".

It's easy to pick up and play for anyone, and the more you do, the faster your brain juices will flow. It's real science endorsed by scientists,
